General.Name: M Vision Public Company Limited
General.Description: M Vision Public Company Limited engages in the events organizing business in Thailand. It operates through Technology and Event Organizing, Media and Agency, and Commerce segments. The company organizes various events, such as mobile phone, IT and various technologies, exhibition, sport tournament, tourism campaign, seminar, and other events. It also acts as a publisher and distributor of online and offline media. In addition, the company offers consulting services. M Vision Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
